comments.comment:
verse 1 (we) chorus (we)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Down at your feet, O Lord
Is the most high place
In your presence, Lord
I seek Your face
I seek Your face
x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There is no higher calling
No greater honor
Than to bow and kneel before Your throne
I'm amazed at Your glory
Embraced by Your mercy
O Lord, I live to worship You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Down at your feet, O Lord
Is the most high place
In your presence, Lord
We seek Your face
We seek Your face
x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
There is no higher calling
No greater honor
Than to bow and kneel before Your throne
We're amazed at Your glory
Embraced by Your mercy
O Lord, we live to worship You
